DeliveryAddress.AddressLine: Selected under top 55 civil engineering UG Students from all over India for Summer Camp'06 held at IIT

StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: • MBA from S. P. Jain School of Global Management (Dubai, Sydney, Singapore) with Civil Engineering graduation. • A result oriented professional with 5.5+ years of experience in one of the largest Engineering, Procurement & Construction company Larsen & Toubro Ltd. • Job profile majorly involved working in cross-functional & cross-cultural teams for design coordination with back offices, process optimization, risk assessment, planning, monitoring & controlling fast track projects, proactively highlighting upcoming issues to management, clients etc. • Good team player with organizational abilities, adaptable & quick learner; possess skills to work under pressure; ability to take leadership; strong presentation skills. • Strong negotiation & analytical skills with ability to work with project team, clients, consortium members, subcontractors, vendors in Indian and International Environment. • Knowledge & interest towards concepts of lean management, operations management, sourcing, managing end to end supply chain, financial accounting & marketing. • Strong hold & working experience on MS Office tools, SPSS (data analysis tool), BIM (Building information modelling), Navis works (3D tools), STAAD Pro, Auto CAD, 12 D Modelling, MS Project, Primavera P6 etc.

PositionHistory.Title: Assistant Manager, Interface & Design Coordination team
PositionHistory.Description: Larsen & Toubro Ltd. - 63 months • Project: Salalah International Airport, Sultanate of Oman-$1.7 billion USD Feb'11-Oct'13 Client: Ministry of Transportation & Communication (Sultanate of Oman); Cowi-Larsen (Denmark); ADPi; Hill International (United States) Designation: Assistant Manager, Interface & Design Coordination team

PositionHistory.Title: Senior Design Engineer, Interface & Design Coordination team, Planning team
PositionHistory.Description: • Project: Delhi International Airport -Delhi, India-$2.7 billion USD Jul'08-Feb'11 Client: GMR Infrastructure Company Designation: Senior Design Engineer, Interface & Design Coordination team, Planning team Worked in cross-cultural & cross-functional teams Led & responsible for deliverables of team of 15 people o Have been the front line manager & involved in projects right from tender to implementation of projects. o Established clients, consultants & subcontractor relationship to understand their requirements. o Interacted with designers & architects based in India, Denmark, UAE, China and Sweden for design development & interface issues as per end-user requirements & specifications mentioned in tender. o Data analysis for development of design of Runways/Taxiways, design briefs, works methodology etc. o Developed layout plan of entire airport by locating buildings, services, and utilities etc. o Identified various KPI's & developed presentations for reporting to top management, planning department, clients on progress updates along with highlighting various issues proactively. o Tracked the deliverables from back offices & vendors and identified short logs. Highlighted the impact of delays & developed catch up plan to ensure meeting the project deliverables end date. o Risk assessment by utilizing 3Dtools for process optimization of design development & execution o Successfully coordinated & presented the design of Airport to DGSAS, Oman (Directorate General of Security & Aviation Services) & DGCA (Directorate General of Civil Aviation), Delhi for certification & commissioning of Airport. o Worked with Purchase/ Contract department- raised RFP, RFQ and performed techno-commercial evaluation for vendor and subcontractor finalization as per contract and specifications. o Prepared contractual letters towards contractual variations & disruptions by assisting contracts. o Conducted time impact analysis to calculate extension of time (EOT) and ensured deliverables within the least possible time frame.

School.SchoolName: S P Jain School of Global Management

Degree.Comments: • Global Masters in Business Administration, Logistics & Supply Chain Jan '14 - Dec'14 S P Jain School of Global Management (SPJSGM), Singapore, Sydney, Dubai

School.SchoolName: S. G. S. Institute of Technology and Science, RGPV University

Degree.Comments:
• Bachelor of Engineering, Civil Engineering (Gold Medalist) Jul'04- Apr'08 S. G. S. Institute of Technology and Science, RGPV University, Indore
Management Consultancy Projects as Internships

School.SchoolName: Analysis of Dell's Supply Chain Nerve Center

Degree.Comments: • Client: DELL Global B.V. Singapore Sep'14 - Dec'14 Analysis of Dell's Supply Chain Nerve Center (Supply Chain Control Tower) o Study and evaluate scope and functionality of supply chain control tower, a central hub that plan and governs end to end global supply chain, across various industries.

o Conduct primary research at Dell's Supply Chain Nerve Center to analyze and map the supply chain global governance processes of Dell in line with the key targeted KPIs o Recommend process improvement for Dell's supply chain nerve center to govern global operations.
• Client: Woolworths Ltd, Australia's leading retailer, Sydney (Australia) May'14 - Aug'14 Monitoring & controlling Distribution Centre (DCs) through Business Intelligence Dashboard o Selected Vendor and evaluated various business intelligence software (Qlikview, Tableau, Yellow fin) o Identified key performance indicators (KPIs) and developed an intuitive customized single screen dashboard to analyze data more effectively compared to existing monitoring system.
o Developed solution for Woolworth's Logistics Management to perform root cause analysis to enhance the performance across entire DCs network in Australia.

sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:Description: Sonal Sharma's experience appears to be concentrated in Engineering / General Engineering, with exposure to Finance / Financial Planning & Analysis. Sonal Sharma has 5 years of work experience, with several years tenure in management, including a low-level position.
sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:ManagementStory: Starting on 2/1/2011, the candidate held the following low-level management position for 2 years and 8 months: Title: Assistant Manager, Interface & Design Coordination team for Ministry of Transportation & Communication
